title: Recorded video on Pixel 3 is shortened to 1 second loop
content:
I have recorded multiple videos on my Pixel 3 and watched them in full after recording them, but some videos do not appear to save properly.  It may have something to do with the back-up process, since I can usually watch the videos the same day I record them fine, but a few days later the video is only one second long.  It does not happen to every video, but it has happened for three videos since early September.

I do not know if there has been an Android update recently, and I am not very tech-savvy, so I do not even know where to begin looking for the video that was saved to the phone instead of Google Photos.

Some of these videos were from a vacation and I'm hoping they are not lost forever, but I just want to know how to get the full video back, and how to prevent this from happening in the future.
